original_title: Glimt fra New York og den Norske koloni
overview: Norwegian film documentary from 1931. It begins with the ship "Stavangersfjord"'s arrival in Brooklyn, followed by scenes from different streets and neighborhoods, the Norwegian Consulate General and Consul General Wilhelm Thorleif von Munthe of Morgenstierne. Furthermore, the Holland Tunnel and chief engineer Singstad's home, and a number of Norwegian institutions. The Norwegian Seamen's Church and seamen's home. The Norwegian hospital, Norwegian newspapers and so on.
title: Glimpse from New York and the Norwegian colony
